text:
Xu Jiujing (born 13 July 1995) is a Chinese female volleyball player. She was part of the China women's national volleyball team. She participated in the 2015 Montreux Volley Masters, 2015 Asian Women's U23 Volleyball Championship, 2015 FIVB Volleyball Women's U23 World Championship, and 2016 Asian Women's Volleyball Cup.
At the club level, she played for Shanghai women's volleyball team.

annotations.surface_form: 2015 FIVB Volleyball Women's U23 World Championship
